Parameters.Name: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-2 PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Continuous move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom'
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Continuous move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom', move status is supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Continuous move is supported for 'Zoom', move status is supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Continuous move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', move status is supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Continuous move is not supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Three GetStatus commands is recived twice. First GetStatus returns PanTilt = Moving
Test.Description: Until moveTimeout + timeout1 timeout expires repeat GetStatus !!!Execute Features.01_02!!

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Three GetStatus commands is recived twice.First GetStatus returns zoom = Moving
Test.Description: Until moveTimeout + timeout1 timeout expires repeat GetStatus !!!Execute Features.01_02!!

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: check annex 8 timeout should be 7 seconds
Test.Description: Until moveTimeout + timeout1 timeout expires repeat GetStatus !!!Execute Features.01_02!!

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: No GetStatus commands Timeout = 60 + operation delay
Test.Description: !!!Execute Features.01_01!!

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: No GetStatus commands Timeout = 3 + operation delay
Test.Description: !!!Execute Features.01_01!!

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: MoveStatus.Zoom is Moving, but Zomm moving not supported
Test.Description: !!!Execute Features.01_04!! Until moveTimeout + timeout1 timeout expires repeat GetStatus

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is other than IDLE
Test.Description: 9.3.2 If moveTimeout + timeout1 timeout expires for step 9.3.1 and the last ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is other than IDLE, FAIL the test and skip other steps. Execute Features.01_02

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is other than IDLE
Test.Description: 9.3.1.3.2 If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is other than IDLE, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is not specified
Test.Description: 9.3.1.4 If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is not specified, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is not specified, FAIL the test and skip other steps
Test.Description: 9.3.1.3.1 If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is not specified, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt = UNKNOWN, FAIL the test and skip other steps
Test.Description: 9.3.1.5 If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt = UNKNOWN, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom = UNKNOWN
Test.Description: 9.3.1.3.2 If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is other than IDLE, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is other than IDLE

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is other than IDLE. Last GetStatus MoveStatus.Zoom is not specified
Test.Description: To complite the test MoveStatus.Zoom is not specified in last GetStatus.

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is not specified

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is not specified

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt is other than IDLE

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom = UNKNOWN

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Three GetStatus commands for second move is recived, third is incorrect

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: No MoveStatus in the second GetStatus

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: No MoveStatus in the first GetStatus

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: ptz6: Correct response

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Correct response when there is profile for PTZConfiguration with not selected node

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: First GetStatus without position
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE test when DUT return correct response. Features.289 in Features_2.xml no nodes are selected

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: No Position in the second GetStatus

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Correct response - without any default spaces

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Media Profile in GetProfiles wo/PTZ w/VS

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: Wrong response (MOVING on first GetStatus)
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE test when DUT return correct response. Features.273 in Features_2. (all features are supported) ptz6 node is selected on management tab

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: MOVING on first GetStatus. Timeout is less then 60s
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE test when DUT return correct response. Features.273 in Features_2. (all features are supported) ptz6 node is selected on management tab

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: there is no PTZ configuration for selected node
Test.Description: Check NVT PTZ RELATIVE MOVE test when DUT return correct response. Feature.273 in Features_2.xml Selected node - ptz0

Test.TestName: PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: No spaces in GetConfigurationOptions
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONTINUOUS MOVE USING MEDIA2 PROFILE test when DUT return correct response. Not selected Node, Features.273 (all PTZ features are supported) No spaces in GetConfigurationOptions

Test.Name: ptz6: Wrong response (MOVING on second GetStatus)
